resources.string: People often have trouble deciding what to do.

This application uses the power of suggestion to help you decide how to spend your free time based on day of the week, time of day, and your specification of suggestion category (such as food, places to go, books, movies). The application will start by selecting options from multiple categories randomly or you can specify a type of activity you are looking for and the suggestions will be filtered to fit that type. You can filter by pressing the icons on the bottom of the main screen.

We believe that lots of services provide suggestions based on your previous purchases (like Amazon) or your previous visits (like Yelp) or even your music preferences (like Pandora) but that a purely spontaneous suggestion based on less history can be a really great and useful thing; it can get you to consider something you might never have been exposed to before.
Have you ever read Moby Dick?
The Museum of Art is amazing.
I could really go for a pizza.
